channel.title: What do I buy?
channel.description: Lol so I'm shitty at EoC. I have the general concept down, but really that's all. I've got a budget of 33,631,493 gp right now. I could probably get a couple more mill by selling some shit in my bank. Here's my issue. I've got 73 attack, 99 strength, and 90 def. I want to at least get my attack to 90, lol. I don't know what armor or weapon to buy. I've seriously been sitting in EoC training bullshit for no apparent reason because I can't figure out what to use.

item.title: What do I buy?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Krackkid, post:23, topic:518111”][quote author=t4 link=topic=636375.msg4291418#msg4291418 date=1367325013]
sell the gold, buy a pack of gum
[/quote]No one ever pays me in 5 gum :/[/quote]
You had one job. ONE JOB.

Read full topic

item.title: What do I buy?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:17, topic:518111”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=636375.msg4290889#msg4290889 date=1367195833]

What’s your magic level?

only 87
I was going to get it 90, and then spaced.

If you have done The World Wakes, you could get either 92 for Bloodfire barrage or 95 for Fire surge and safe spot Automatons Generators. They are pretty good money plus the chance for Static gloves, which are a little over 10m right now. The only armor you’d need is either Void mage or Ganodermic.

Well, I haven’t done it, want to do it for me

No, you must do it yourself to get the full experience and story of Guthix’s past. It is an amazing quest.

But I’m so bad at combat now
[/quote]
I used magic for all of the combat fights. If you have done Ritual of the Mahjarrat, use an Armadyl battlestaff and the spell Storm of Armadyl.[/quote]
And just auto cast it?

Read full topic

I used magic for all of the combat fights. If you have done Ritual of the Mahjarrat, use an Armadyl battlestaff and the spell Storm of Armadyl.

item.title: What do I buy?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:9, topic:518111”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=636375.msg4290818#msg4290818 date=1367185623]

You’ll want to get a whip, veracs top/bottom, dragon boots, culimancer gloves (what ever the highest you can get) a nezzy helm and use your strength skill cape. Save the rest of your money and either get prayer or herblore up.

Gano boots are better than dragon boots, I have Culimancer gloves 10, nezzy help, a whip, str cape.
Plus, veracs is equal to bandos, and bandos doesn’t degrade.

I see no reason for you even making this thread if you already have all your gear…

I don’t have all
I have: Gloves, Nezzy Helm, Whip, Str Cape.
They were in my bank.
[/quote]
If you get at least 92 prayer, you could pull off Melee void armor.[/quote]
I have 70 pray

Read full topic
